Name: Neon Blast
About the game: Welcome to Neon Blast, the new spaceshooter from the Hemphage Studio . In this game, there are no more friends, no more families, just you and your ennemies ! Come to show them your superiority .Each games of Neon Blast is unique thanks to the many bonuses available throughout the game, many turn of events that will only increase the adrenaline! With a random bonus system, Neon Blast remains intense throughout the game. But no question of panic! Stay strategic and the victory will be yours! Be focused, defeat your enemies and win. With a simple artistic direction and an effective sound design, Neon Blast is the game for you! features: Full controller support The artistic direction based on neon lights will illuminate your games ability to randomly Select Maps fun and fast game Style A call to friendliness with local multiplayer support and a split screen system
